attributes.action: Stop the cross channel immigrants landing.
attributes.additional_details: Because our country is under pressure at every level, housing, schooling, the NHS. Also the criminality is out of control … child abuse, rape, murders, drug gangs, knife crime, shop lifting.
attributes.background: Instead of RNLI and the Border Force picking up illegal immigrants and bringing them to the UK they should return them to a beach in France.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
